name: debt-tracker
description: You owe me a beer! This extension is perfect for developers who want to help their fellow developers out, but also want to keep track of who owes them what. With the Debt Tracker Extension, you can add people to your list, and keep track of their debts. No more awkward moments trying to remember who owes you that slice of pizza from last week's hackathon. Get the Debt Counter Extension now and never worry about being owed again!
